title: Innovative Language Learning Design Utilizing an Open Educational Quality Framework

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language learning theories and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: A course focused on designing and evaluating language projects using Open Educational Resources (OER).

learning_goals: Explain the three dimensions (learning design, process, and outcomes) of the open educational quality framework at a level applicable to language learning projects
Develop a quality evaluation checklist for language learning by adapting the ISO/IEC 40180 standard process model
Complete and present open-resource-based language projects (e.g., multilingual digital storytelling) using a PBL approach
Propose project improvement strategies utilizing the macro-meso-micro three-tier quality management model

resources: Access to OER (Open Educational Resources) databases

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
